Name: CRASH TEST IDIOT
About the game: You have been hired to Crash Test every car in the city. This is an incredibly realistic driving game with a lot of possibilities. The soft-body physics engine simulates every component of a vehicle in real-time, resulting in true-to-life behavior. With meticulous design, intensive research, and experience, the simulation authentically recreates the excitement of Crash Test driving. You must completely destroy ALL of the Cars. Each car has its own scoring system. What is the Highest score You can get ? Use cool Camera effects like Bullet-Time, so, You can see every detail of the destruction. Several different car types like Sedan, SUV and Hatchback with many different paint jobs. Can You be the Top ' CRASH TEST IDIOT ' ?
